title: PreciousMetapsICT
author: PreciousMetapsICT
content: Decided to part with my #19/21 Lucho Mood mask This is my auction - No reserve - highest bid will own this beautiful artworkhttps://scarce.city/auctions/lucho-mask-19Just figured it couldn’t hurt to spread the word over here. If you missed out on these before, this is your best chance to own one 2 day auction - ends Thursday afternoon

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on June 13, 2023, 11:46:35 PMare bids allowed here in the thread?Feel free to bid over here but it will not count. lol Have to register with Scarce.city to bid - its easy and painless. Just wanted to spread the word in hopes to increase the action

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: this very mask has slipped thru my hands twice. maybe 3rd time is a charm.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Ohhh man.. thats a rare collectible. Cant remember if its loaded or not

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on June 14, 2023, 02:29:09 AMOhhh man.. thats a rare collectible. Cant remember if its loaded or notloaded with 0.0021 and over 4 oz of silver

comments.author: Honeybadger2014
comments.body: oh man, this is even better than my unloaded AP3 then! it is also a lot more colorful.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Uhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 15, 2023, 12:56:49 PMUhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale. Box is amazing work. Held together by hand notched dovetails (at least that’s what it looks like to me). Auction ends at 2:00 pm US Central time today Still way undervalued compared to what I paid and what these historically go for. Good luck to all bidders and thanks for bidding

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 02:21:50 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on June 15, 2023, 12:56:49 PMUhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale. Box is amazing work. Held together by hand notched dovetails (at least that’s what it looks like to me). Auction ends at 2:00 pm US Central time today Still way undervalued compared to what I paid and what these historically go for. Good luck to all bidders and thanks for bidding yes it is far below what you paid but still at nearly 4x the original price.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 15, 2023, 02:26:10 PMQuote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 02:21:50 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on June 15, 2023, 12:56:49 PMUhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale. Box is amazing work. Held together by hand notched dovetails (at least that’s what it looks like to me). Auction ends at 2:00 pm US Central time today Still way undervalued compared to what I paid and what these historically go for. Good luck to all bidders and thanks for bidding yes it is far below what you paid but still at nearly 4x the original price. I never saw the original price or presale price - but did see the auction by claycast where they were over 3k fiat with a lot of people fighting for it. Presale price must have been great but I’m guessing it took a long time to receive it. Either way - what’s done is done - if I take an L then at least it’s just $$$

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: 16 minutes left… I’m very tempted to run the bidding more… but anyone who watched S&B yesterday… this mask is fetching more of a premium than the og loaded cass…

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 03:39:50 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 15, 2023, 02:26:10 PMQuote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 02:21:50 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on June 15, 2023, 12:56:49 PMUhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale. Box is amazing work. Held together by hand notched dovetails (at least that’s what it looks like to me). Auction ends at 2:00 pm US Central time today Still way undervalued compared to what I paid and what these historically go for. Good luck to all bidders and thanks for bidding yes it is far below what you paid but still at nearly 4x the original price. I never saw the original price or presale price - but did see the auction by claycast where they were over 3k fiat with a lot of people fighting for it. Presale price must have been great but I’m guessing it took a long time to receive it. Either way - what’s done is done - if I take an L then at least it’s just $$$ yea, I only know the original price because it was mine lol I was glad to see the price go up further though I still think you took a loss sats wise.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on June 15, 2023, 06:48:07 PM16 minutes left… I’m very tempted to run the bidding more… but anyone who watched S&B yesterday… this mask is fetching more of a premium than the og loaded cass…Way more OG loaded Cas coins out there than Lucho/Clay cast masksBut I really didn’t expect it to go that high either. Not in this market. Almost a break even - btc wise for me If memory serves me correctly the last lucho mask on scarce city went for over 3k (I wanna say around $3500)Either way - thanks for bidding!

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Way more OG loaded Cas coins out there than Lucho/Clay cast masksBut I really didn’t expect it to go that high either. Not in this market. Almost a break even - btc wise for me If memory serves me correctly the last lucho mask on scarce city went for over 3k (I wanna say around $3500)Either way - thanks for bidding! [/quote]I agree with that! And this auction reflects what you said too.  lately from what I’ve been looking at cass coins are always fetching very high premium even the peeled ones… I think it was a 1 btc cass went for almost 80k! Approx 3x the load value…This I understood was loaded at .0021 and sold for approx 50x loaded value… the sale I think reflects the scarcity of the item. I wanted it, not as bad as others tho… Congrats on the sale!

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 15, 2023, 07:38:22 PMQuote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 03:39:50 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 15, 2023, 02:26:10 PMQuote from: PreciousMetapsICT on June 15, 2023, 02:21:50 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on June 15, 2023, 12:56:49 PMUhhh, amazing art piece, I've never noticed the wooden box before. For sure a lot of heart, work and silver (!) was poured into this project.Good luck with the sale. Box is amazing work. Held together by hand notched dovetails (at least that’s what it looks like to me). Auction ends at 2:00 pm US Central time today Still way undervalued compared to what I paid and what these historically go for. Good luck to all bidders and thanks for bidding yes it is far below what you paid but still at nearly 4x the original price. I never saw the original price or presale price - but did see the auction by claycast where they were over 3k fiat with a lot of people fighting for it. Presale price must have been great but I’m guessing it took a long time to receive it. Either way - what’s done is done - if I take an L then at least it’s just $$$ yea, I only know the original price because it was mine lol I was glad to see the price go up further though I still think you took a loss sats wise.I buy my sats with fiat so it’s easy to know about what I had in the .11 I paid for it. Let’s be honest tho - zero chance I would still have the sats. I see something shiny and there goes the sats. I once had .25 saved to a ballet - then a new squirrelbit was released so had to peel. I’m not a saver, I’m a spender - which is why I love crypto collectibles. Also why I prefer lower premium over load value than the Lucho mask. I like to actually stack sats with my collectibles. Either way - thanks to all who bid - was fun and nerve wracking at the same time
